text: What would be the fastest way at scale to create a new web page for ever product in a HubDB table?
right, but that wouldnt allow me to create 900+ new pages automatically based on my HubDB table
It would create a new page for every row in your HubDB
oh . i was going to export as xml and import as "blog" post
but if i could just grab the data directly from the table and create a page that would be fantastic

That’s exactly what this does. It allows you to generate pages pulling data directly from the HubDB.

No export needed, and the HubDB is still linked to the pages so changes to the HubDB update the pages.
how can i auto-generate the page-title and path?

You said you’re doing this with products? I would set the product title to be the page-title
I would do the same for the URL path but obviously make it URL safe.

As for how you could get the data into the HubDB and do it in mass, one idea is export as CSV, use google sheets or excel to clone the values from product name to page title. Then for url you could use a function to convert the product title to URL safe.

There are a lot of ways you could do it, this is just one example that’s less technical
